.. sip:method-description::
    :status: todo
    :pysig: 48ea7f29544a4b5ea2f34493f2c554e0
    :realsig: (GLuint,const QMatrix4x4&,const QMatrix3x3&)
    :digest: 755dc1ae26ece0c103563c3bca19c341

Performs the blit with the source texture *texture*.

*targetTransform* specifies the transformation applied. This is usually generated by the :sip:ref:`~PyQt6.QtOpenGL.QOpenGLTextureBlitter.targetTransform` helper function.

*sourceTransform* specifies the transformation applied to the source. This allows using only a sub-rect of the source texture. This is usually generated by the :sip:ref:`~PyQt6.QtOpenGL.QOpenGLTextureBlitter.sourceTransform` helper function.

.. seealso:: :sip:ref:`~PyQt6.QtOpenGL.QOpenGLTextureBlitter.sourceTransform`, :sip:ref:`~PyQt6.QtOpenGL.QOpenGLTextureBlitter.targetTransform`, :sip:ref:`~PyQt6.QtOpenGL.QOpenGLTextureBlitter.Origin.Origin`, :sip:ref:`~PyQt6.QtOpenGL.QOpenGLTextureBlitter.bind`.
